use_subfolder.title: Save local attachments to subdirectory
use_subfolder.description: Local attachments (images and other files) will be stored in a subdirectory of the current working directory. Create a subdirectory if it does not exist

subfolder.title: The name of the subdirectory where the local attachments are stored

infoalertenable.title: Whether to display popup information
infoalertenable.description: In each operation, the pop-up window in the upper right corner displays the status

description: Quick and easy to paste/delete local attachments (images and other files) in Markdown
name: markdown-local-attachments
